positions.title: Regional Director of Corporate Sales, *Hiring Account Executives*
positions.description:
MongoDB, Inc. is the company behind MongoDB. We build MongoDB and the drivers, we sell software and services to make your life easier. We also run MongoDB University and sponsor the community, hosting MongoDB World and MongoDB Days all over the globe. With offices across North America, Europe, and Asia, we are close to where you do business.

*30 million+ downloads
*DB-Engines ranking: #4
*Leader in Forrester NoSQL Wave 2016
*Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Big Data NoSQL 2016
*172% growth in popularity in the last 20 months
*Named to the 2017 CNBC Disruptor 50 List and CEO Recognized by EY
*On Wall Street Journal’s Billion Dollar Startup Club
*Successful IPO October 2017

*Awarded #1 CAE Team Worldwide, 2016
*Club Winner 2016
*# 1 CAE team WW in Q3 2017
*Highest Corporate WW Sales to date, Q3 2017
*Largest Corporate deal in company history, Q2 2018
*198% of plan 2018
…
see more

positions.title: Director of Sales
positions.description:
Get Smart Content is a website personalization platform designed to create relevant content experiences, increases engagement and conversion. We use anonymous behavioral, firmographic and known data to create unique website experiences for all of your website visitors and serve a timely experience at each step of the buyer's journey.

Our clients leverage data for personalization from our integrations from tools such as: Eloqua, BlueKai, Demandbase, LinkedIn, and Marketo. Industry-leading organizations such as HP, Cetera, Rockwell Automation, Cummins, Siemens, and Renesas rely on Get Smart Content to personalize their websites.

* Part of the founding sales team
* Managed mid-market North America sales team
* Developed scalable travel and mid-market business lines
* Increased ACV by 58%
* Top 2 Largest deals in company history
…
see more

given.text:
Laura has been an important asset in developing our partnership by identifying opportunities for our businesses to support each other. She has identified a number of top Enterprise organizations and assisted in strategy development to better align and support our opportunities cohesively. Laura has been a pleasure to work with and I'm looking forward to developing our partnership further!
…
See more

Laura and I have been partnering to serve our customers for the past two years and she is a delight! We've worked together strategizing on how to get our mutual clients and future clients value. Laura is transparent, smart, organized and warm. I've enjoyed collaborating with her and look forward to knowing her for years to come! I would hire or partner with Laura any chance I can...she's "good people"!
…
See more

Laura is a wonderful sales person. She thoroughly understands her product, is knowledgeable about the tourism industry and was able to provide relevant and detailed case studies of successes. I am happy that Laura keeps in touch with me even after we signed on as clients!

Working with Laura really is a pleasure. She gets it when it comes to the challenges that DMO's like Fort Worth face. There has never been a doubt that she has the best interests of our bureau in mind. Laura gets the difference between being my sales rep vs. being a partner. Laura and the Get Smart team have made a true impact on our owned digital media efforts and it's an easy recommendation to work with them. Thanks Laura!
…
See more

Laura is one of the most dedicated Sales Directors I know. She excels at working with prospects to really understand their needs and as a result builds strong, trusted relationships that go beyond the sales cycle. She is committed to the business and does whatever is needed to ensure that everyone has what they need to be successful. She is a great partner, a wonderful mentor to her junior teams, and huge contributor to the positive morale of the company. Everything she does, she does with a smile on her face. I truly enjoyed partnering with Laura during my tenure at Get Smart Content and I would welcome any opportunity to work with her again.
…
See more

I had the pleasure of being Laura's direct report for over a year, and have been lucky enough to continue our friendship outside of the workplace for many years since then. Laura is an anomaly among leaders - she leads by solid example, and cultivates a work hard/play hard culture. Not only is Laura's management style built on a foundation of killer sales success and acumen, but she has the unique ability to sense the strengths in her team and help them hone in on those characteristics to maximize their potential. Laura's individual success with her own prospects and customers instills a sense of confidence and respect from her team, and inspires them to excel. I learned an immeasurable amount of valuable sales (and general professional) skills from Laura during the time we worked together, and I will always welcome the opportunity to work with her again.
…
See more

Laura is without a doubt one of the hardest working, most dedicated, loyal, honest, friendly, and business minded people I've ever worked with. She exudes confidence, maturity, and a general executive presence that is leaps above most. Over the past 5 years I've worked with Laura as both a peer and a friend and if I ever get the opportunity to work with her again, I will take it in a heartbeat. Can't recommend Laura enough, she is awesome.
…
See more

The best single phrase to describe Laura is relationship builder. Internally at Get Smart Content, she was single-handedly the biggest contribution to our positive morale and made me and others around her smile every day. She was also frequently the first to own and contribute to initiatives that would create lasting impact in improving the sales process across the team. I got to collaborate with her a lot in our shared territory and our high productivity was a direct result of how we worked together to address the market. Her enthusiastic attitude extends to her client relationships as well, as she strives to build trust by delivering the most value at each interaction. This includes learning and clearly differentiating in new categories of software, understanding the background and goals of her clients, and constantly making the sincere effort to understand their roles and how to add value to them. I really enjoyed working with Laura and would happily recommend her!
…
See more

I truly enjoyed working with Laura when she was a Managing Director of Client Growth at Meltwater. Laura was dedicated, motivating, flexible and well-informed on the latest technologies and trend in an ever-changing industry. I know with these characteristics…she’ll be successfully wherever she goes.
Laura is all around one of the most talented people I know, she posses a keen sense of assessing a situation to obtain solution finding movement.

Laura is one of the best people I've work with. She is an inspiring leader who always delivers very strong results and knows how to create a great culture in her teams. I had the pleasure of working with Laura for 18 months at Meltwater. During that time she was head of our Austin office and proved to incredibly effective and knowledgeable. She had an efficient strategy lined up to make sure we always reached our goals as an organization and she was excellent in mobilizing her team members and colleagues. Laura would be an asset to any company.
…
See more

Dedicated and trustworthy come to mind when I think of my time working directly for Laura at Meltwater Group. She is always able to provide support and guidance to her employees while still optimizing output and generating business success for the overall organization. I will reference the business acumen I gained from her tutelage for the rest of my career.
…
See more

received.text: Debe has been instrumental in developing our partnership by helping define the value our solutions offer our clients when our platforms are paired. Working closely with Debe on outbound strategies and messaging has enabled our organizations to seamless align strategies for shared opportunities. Debe is highly regarded in her organization and industry and it has been a true pleasure to develop an authentic relationship with Debe!

Matt is an innovative and progressive leader in his industry. He is highly regarded for his strides to move the organization forward and continue to find new ways to engage their audiences. His ability to maximize business opportunities and development instrumental programs is a testament to his hard work. It has truly been a pleasure to work with Matt!
